steps.title: Start with the name of the Participant
steps.content: Start typing the name and if they're in the database already, their name will pop up. If not, you can click on New Individual

steps.title: Now choose the event
steps.content: Start typing the name of the event and you'll be able to choose from the drop down list

steps.title: Check the default settings
steps.content: The Role, Date and Status are automatically prefilled so these just need checking.

steps.title: Do you need to record where the registration was collected?
Additional information
steps.content: If the event is a paid event, or if the confirmation emails are set up, for example, these options appear after you select the event.
